answers.answer: I've noticed I've been thirsty lately too, just your body telling you that you need more water. (=  But If you get to a point where you are constantly thirsty or your thirst increases a lot talk to your doctor because that's a sign of gestational diabetes
Oh yes, I've been guzzling down water like crazy. I go to the doctor next week and I'm going to ask about it!

question: Im 24wks and been quite thirsty over the last few days. Im drinking more water but just wondering if anyone else is feeling it too at this stage?
title: anyone thirsty?
